title: WhatsApp Web <small style="color:var(--color-green);">(3)</small>
content: Link an extra WhatsApp account to Routin Cloud using your phone number. This connection is secure and free of extra charge. You can also use our external API at https://routin.cloud

title: Blacklist WhatsApp Web
content: Block unwanted messages by entering phone numbers. This feature only blocks messages within our platform, not on WhatsApp or other messaging apps

title: Department ID
content: Assign a departments to all conversations started from WhatsApp. Insert the department ID.
